meanings: rush into the ranks of the enemy

vlive.korean: [연준의 돌격에 막냉이 탈락] 얘부터 얘부터! [YEONJUN's drove HUENING out] Do that to him first! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.5
vlive.english: [YEONJUN's drove HUENING out] Do that to him first!

vlive.korean: 너무 강했어 - 채연스테이 님 굿나잇 - 돌격해! It was too strong. - CHAEYEON STAY, good night. - Go! 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] Stray Kids X LieV - 스트레이 키즈의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: It was too strong. - CHAEYEON STAY, good night. - Go!

vlive.korean: 돌격! 그다음 나 돌격! Charge! Then me! 듣기 View video NCT : 보고싶었쥬?💚💚💚💚
돌격! - 으아! Charge! - Argh! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NCT] 일이칠 텐션 따라가다 벌써 무중력 상태에 있쥬‼️‼️ (NCT 127 talking about their concert and new album)
돌격! - 왜 안 찢어지지? Charge! - Why won't it rip? 듣기 View video NCT : 보고싶었쥬?💚💚💚💚

examples.korean: He led the charge down the field. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 돌격을 지휘하며 들판을 달려 내려갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He led the charge down the field. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: beat a parley[an alarm, a charge] 듣기 Add to Wordbook 북을 울려 협상을 제의하다[경고 신호를 보내다, 돌격 명령을 내리다]. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: beat a parley[an alarm, a charge] Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The Greeks rushed at their enemies. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그리스인들은 적을 향해 돌격했다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The Greeks rushed at their enemies. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The bull charges when he sees the color red. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 소는 빨간색을 보면 돌격한다. Neungyule

examples.korean: The soldier sounded the charge abruptly. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 병사는 갑작스럽게 돌격 나팔을 불었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
